description.value:
Trigger You Drop Prone or otherwise become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

As you fall to the ground, you transform into a white bottle, gourd, or sake jar, then roll away before anyone can pick you up. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Crawl] up to two times, and your movement doesn't provoke reactionsâ€”you somehow always roll just out of reach. When you come to a stop, you return to your tanuki form, face down on the ground.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
